title: What are your favorite indian ads?
selftext:
Maybe they are unique, maybe they had great music, maybe the acting was good or simply reminds your of your childhood.

What is your favorite ads that you remember?

I loved these ones. Back in 2013, i way blown away with these transitions by Parle's "Happy Happy" cookies ad :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-zkCeFs1U0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tXLGqqym_Hg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Z6mBqCMm9w


Share some of your favorite ones.
comments:
Airtel - Har ek friend zaroori hota hai

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4WgP8sTCO2Q&ab\_channel=imranhussain](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4WgP8sTCO2Q&ab_channel=imranhussain)

The hindu - classroom 

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Flmpg5IZ7qA&ab\_channel=TheHindu](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Flmpg5IZ7qA&ab_channel=TheHindu)

lifebouy handwash -help a child reach 5

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiVfmTNRRV0&ab\_channel=Infowatershade](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiVfmTNRRV0&ab_channel=Infowatershade)
[Doodh doodh doodh doodh ad](https://youtu.be/u24D5ljr0Ao) from the 90s!
Lux cozi.yeh to bad toi hai

Bajaj hamara bajaj, bajaj caliber 115 hoodibaba.
Suzuki samurai no problem.
Mentos ads.
Feviquick fishing ad.
Pepsi common india dikhado
"Men will be men." - freaking legend of all ads.

This, absolutely love this ad ❤️, the nostalgia it carries ... I remember when I was 2 and when it came up on TV how I stopped what I was doing and loved it so much ... even now when it comes on it takes me back to those days, seriously what an ad
cleaned_text: favorite indian ads maybe unique maybe great music maybe acting good simply reminds childhood favorite ads remember loved ones back way blown away transitions parles happy happy cookies ad share favorite ones
